name: Witch Hunt (itch) (Lemons Makes Games)
description:
Join Luna the witch as she cleans up a mess that she made!

She accidently broke the ancient elemental seal, releasing powerful elementals into the world. It is now her duty to defeat them and send them back to where they belong using her binding magic!

This was done as part of the 2021 Bullet Hell Game Jam in collaboration with Aarrow (@5ArtsDragon), who did all music and sound effects
